item.title: Research Articles
item.description: Below you can access all my math research articles. Most of them are published but some are not. Bibliography Rodriguez Villegas, F. (1984). (in Spanish). Quaternionic extensions. In: Proceedings of the IV Coloquio Latinoamericano De Algebra, Mendoza, Argentina. Rodriguez Villegas, F. (1986). Quaternionic extensions and rotations. Notas De La Sociedad Matemática De Chile, 5(1), 201–202. Rodriguez Villegas, F. (1987). (Unpublished). Relations between quadratic forms and certain Galois extensions. Rodriguez Villegas, F.
